TopicTitle: Shared Horizons vs No Place Like Home - Which do I pick?

Articles.Content:
Hi, I haven't been playing KSP in a very long time and would like to get back on track.

So, i see in the download section that there seem to be 2 different games:

  • Shared Horizons 1.10.1
  • There's no place like home 1.9.1

Whats the difference? I guess you have to make a basic decision which way to go? Can you install and run both?

How do they behave with mods?

Thanks for replies in advance!

Chris

Those are sequential versions of the same stock game. Shared Horizons is a bit newer than No Place Like home, so Horizons has some additional features. As for how they work with mods, that's different every time. Every update can break some mods and it takes time for their makers to unsnarl things, but how quickly that can be done is anybody's guess. I have not heard a preference expressed among mod users for one of these versions over the other. 

And welcome to the forum.
Most mods are working with 1.10 just fine by now, and it has some fairly significant bugfixes so unless there's some specific mod you want to run that's incompatible, I'd go with that one.
